casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Danny Lamont AVERY. No. 269P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 24, 2015. Danny Avery, Bunn, for Avery, Danny Lamont. Sherri Lawrence, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Susan I. Doyle, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of July 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of September 2015."
